cypress-cookies-get-all.description: Get all of the browser cookies.

cypress-cookies-clear-all.description: Clear all browser cookies for current domain and subdomain.

cypress-get.description: Get one or more DOM elements by selector or alias

cypress-go.description: Navigate back or forward to the previous or next URL in the browser’s history.

cypress-scroll-to-coordinates.description: Scroll to a position defined by the distance in pixels from window/element’s x and y or percentage of the window/element’s width and height.

cypress-scroll-to-position.description: Scroll to a specified position. Valid positions are topLeft, top, topRight, left, center, right, bottomLeft, bottom, and bottomRight.

cypress-route.description: Use cy.route() to manage the behavior of network requests.

cypress-server.description: Start a server to begin routing responses to cy.route() and to change the behavior of network requests.

cypress-viewport.description: Control the size of the screen for your application.

cypress-viewport-preset.description: Control the size of the screen for your application via presets. Preset supports the following options: ipad-2, ipad-mini, iphone-3, iphone-4, iphone-5, iphone-6, iphone-6+, iphone-x, iphone-xr, macbook-11, macbook-13, macbook-15, samsung-note9, samsung-s10

cypress-wait.description: Wait for a number of milliseconds or wait for an aliased resource to resolve before moving on to the next command.
